name: Polwire
tag_list: media, new-media--politics, nlp, social-media, twitter, facebook, youtube, text-analysis, blogs, press, semantic-search
overview:
Polwire, is the first site that provides up-to-date streamlined access to archival and real-time press releases and social media posts from politicians and government agencies that include â€“ Congress, US administration, Federal agencies and worldwide government officials and Embassies. Polwire uses powerful text analyzers to categorize information.

Polwire software analyzes websites, social media and text in a targeted way rather than basic search across the full content of the media. Users of Polwire can access stored data of important News Makers, text is analyzed and categorized for users to easily pinpoint content needed by filtered parameters. Polwire will continue adding Public officials from all over the US and the world in various level of government.

Polwire software can be used with other industries and provide interested companies and organizations software to track and anlayze specific sites, blogs and social media accounts.
